attributes.action: Offer self employed financial support for earnings lost due to the Coronavirus
attributes.additional_details:
Because there is no known support available the insurance policies that are already in existence will not pay out and the govt are advising events not to take place or the meeting of groups of people therefore smaller businesses and sole
traders that provide services as a result such as food/catering are being cancelled and there is no compensation offered.
There is no other income there is no other way to earn an income
attributes.background: Offer financial support to those self employed sole traders sme’s who have lost business/income as a result of the threat of coronavirus and now face bankruptcy or financial ruin
